name: Merge Cars - Merge Vehicles
description:
This is a new Simulation game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Blaster Legend" games!

Merge & Develop Your Car!
Ever wanted to be a captain? Ever wanted to be an air giant? Take control of your very own parking apron and airline.
Buy, merge and manage your cars so you can make them run to earn money!

Start your racing empire today!

****************************************************************************************
Download Merge Cars - Merge Vehicles now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
